MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL34 postcode area of Penmaenmawr, affecting properties in Gardd Eryri and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00AM due to an underground cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12:30PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20AM on 20th January 2021
